column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ramen Bar must follow specific design and atmosphere elements as mandated by our corporate headquarters. While we don't always agree with corporate's aesthetics -- I
column3: prefer dinner over soft music -- we are beholden to their ideas and instructions
column4: so it's always nice to hear our customers' willingness to make their own compromises in these regards
column5: rather than immediately downgrading us. Thank you very much again for the comprehensive
column6: kind words regarding our food and restaurant
column7: and we look forward to serving you again soon!
